newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman ups Autodesk.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Goldman ups Autodesk.

text.p: -- Goldman Sachs analyst Laura Conigliaro said she upgraded Autodesk Inc to trading buy from market perform.
-- said she feels "pretty comfortable" that its new Release 14 product will be announced earlier than she was expecting, and will be shipped beginning around May 8.
-- the company will have plenty of time in its second quarter "to get out a decent amount of the product."
-- said the early reception to product has been strong.
-- also cited stock price being down from about 36 earlier this month. Shares gained 2-5/8 to 32-1/8 Monday morning.
-- Autodesk makes computer-aided design (CAD) software for architects and engineers.
